RESLIN.Title: Reslin's Factory - AI Automation
RESLIN.Settings.PatreonToken.Name: Patreon Access Token
RESLIN.Settings.PatreonToken.Hint: Your Patreon access token for membership verification. Click 'Connect Patreon' button to authenticate.
RESLIN.Settings.ApiKey.Name: API Key
RESLIN.Settings.ApiKey.Hint: Your OpenAI-compatible API key for AI generation.
RESLIN.Settings.ApiBaseUrl.Name: API Base URL
RESLIN.Settings.ApiBaseUrl.Hint: The base URL for your API endpoint (e.g., https://api.openai.com/v1)
RESLIN.Settings.ApiModel.Name: Model Name
RESLIN.Settings.ApiModel.Hint: The model to use for generation (e.g., gpt-4, claude-3-opus)
RESLIN.Error.NoToken: Please connect your Patreon account first.
RESLIN.Error.NoApiKey: Please configure your API key in module settings.
RESLIN.Error.NoApiUrl: Please configure your API base URL in module settings.
RESLIN.Error.MembershipRequired: Active Patreon membership required to use this feature.
RESLIN.Dialog.Title: Reslin's Factory - AI Automation (Global)
